Posts.Content: Have a biopsy at least its quicker than waiting for six months and time is the essence with lumps and suspect nodes , my sister has just been diagnosed again with a lump and she is having a biopsy Â as she said its for peace of mind, i wish you all the best.
Posts.Title: Breast Lump

Posts.Content: I had a double mastectomy 15yrs ago , i have noticed swelling about an inch or two in front of my armpit but i was told if its painful i dont need to worry and its normal and more sensitive in these areas for years after , should i be concerned or will it pass or has anyone else had similar signs? it feels lumpy but not a single lump as such.
Posts.Title: pain and swelling 15yrs after double mastectomy
